From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To clear the contents of the XML system message logging (syslog) buffer, use the **clear logging xml** command in User EXEC or Priviledged EXEC mode..

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: In the following example, the XML-specific buffer is cleared:
ExtraInfo: This command clears the contents of the XML-formatted logging buffer, but does not clear the contents of the standard logging buffer. The system will prompt you to confirm the action before clearing the buffer.

RelatedCmds.description: Enables system message logging (syslog) to the XML-specific buffer in XML format.
Displays the state of XML-formatted system message logging, followed by the contents of the XML-specific buffer.
